Name: Stuart Siegler
AboutMe:
Computer Consultant, Marathoner and Triathlete, Pilot, Scuba Diver, Amateur Radio Operator, and Dad.

I've spent the last 15 years as a customer facing Professional Services consultant, doing integration, data center automation, break-fix and call deflection, and pre-emptive/proactive remediation.

I'm currently working with HP Operations Orchestration (HPOO, aka Opsware's PAS), and playing with Android via Bluetooth and Serial IO devices in my spare time.

Before all of my skills deteriorated, I was a pretty well versed in C, Pascal, Java, C++, HTML/Ajax, and various scripting languages.
